nodes.text: Katarn-class Commando Armor, simply Katarn-class armor, was a type of heavy and highly sophisticated clone trooper armor utilized by clone commandos of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. One variant of the Katarn-class armor was the Mk I Katarn-class Commando Armor.
Katarn-class armor sets were equipped with backpacks that contained grenades and sabotage gear, and commandos could choose the colors of their suits.
The four original members of Clone Force 99 wore modified Katarn-class armor.
